entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL2070 error when building in source-build #43253
  • Add AllowLineTerminator option in KestrelServerOptions #43252
  • Run group FinallyConventions after conventions for each endpoint within a group #43246
  • ASP.Net Core MVC Validation at Model Level #43244
  • Unable to connect to the SPA development server at 'https://localhost:44490'. / Visual Studio 2022 - ASP.NET Core Angular #43243
  • The `.Views.dll` is copied into "postProject"-dependent project's output #43238
  • Global endpoint filter #43237
  • Cannot use JSON source generator with (HttpValidation)ProblemDetails #43236
  • Blazor Wasm Transient Disposable registrations of AuthorizationMessageHandler #43234
  • HttpLogging: multiple requests are concurrent, the corresponding relationship between the request and response logs recorded by httplogging will be confused. #43231
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #43230
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add AuthorizationPolicyCache #43227

Closed

  • Support Deprecated in Minimal APIs for Open API #35091
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Requests with new lines at the end cause extra 400 responses #42697
    6.0.9
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] Unable to build sample code on Linux #43251
  • .NET 5 application on IIS 10 randomly crashes with 500.30 code. (dotnet runtime 5.0.10). #43150
  • Cors not working in Minimal API endpoints #42994
    7.0-rc1
  • AdditionalProbingPaths are not honored by ASP.NET Core #43176
  • Blazor Websocket disconnects when not authenticated (AllowAnonymous) #43218
  • [Blazor][Wasm] Dynamic and extensible authentication requests #42580
    7.0-rc1
  • Expose RoutePatternFactory.Combine #42593
    7.0-rc1
  • Add APIs to make it possible for users of RouteEndpointBuilder to use filters #42592
    7.0-rc1
  • UsePathBase being ignored #38448
    7.0-rc1
  • error while saving the HTTPS developer certificate (M1 Mac)- security: SecKeychainItemImport: Unknown format in import. #42887
    7.0-rc1
  • source-building .NET 7 fails if nodejs is installed on the machine #42378
  • Blazor WASM terrible runtime performance from mobile browser #43090
  • How to use the feature in aspnetcore Http.Request to begin processing the entity body before the complete contents of the body have been received. #43084
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43255
  • Remove QuicTransportOptions.IdleTimeout #43250
    area-runtime
  • Cancel client results after a default timeout (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr
  • Retry BidirectionalStream_ServerReadsDataAndCompletes_GracefullyClosed #43245
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add a comment to help enable the crypto worker #43239
    area-mvc
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box #43232
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add another testcase for ExtraLinesBetweenRequestsIgnored #43247
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Reduce state machine in AuthorizationMiddlewareResultHandler #43200
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • [6.0] Skip empty lines between requests #43229
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.9
  • Remove support for some Tasks and ValueTasks declared as objects in RDF #41719
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Reuse PolicyAuthorizationResult #43210
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix typo in trimmer annotation #43219
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth, 7.0-rc1
  • Exclude some .wxl files from localization #43226
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Retry tests #43224
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Skip empty lines between requests #43228
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Fix MVC form data binding localization #43182
    area-mvc
  • Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Avoid failed authN log when the endpoint has IAllowAnonymous metadata #43212
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • HTTP/3: Support QUIC idle timeout more cleanly #43037
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Test abort at end of request #43183
    area-runtime
